ModMetaData.author: Lanilor
ModMetaData.description:
<size=20>Terra Project</size>
A nature mod for Rimworld. New biomes, dynamic terrain, complex plants/farming and much more.
<size=18>Warning: Beta release</size> This mod is currently in a beta state. Most systems should work more or less fine. There still are some balancing issues and higher chances to get errors in uncommon situations. There are also still some simple/bad placeholder textures. Keep in mind that anything can still change and there still may be game-/save-breaking bugs.
Feature summary - 23 new biomes - More realistic maps with correct beach and mountain formations and dynamic mixing biomes - Improved map generation - Biome and plant framework for other mods - Dynamic terrain with dynamic elevation, fertility, ground moisture and water levels - Tides and dynamic river water levels - Dynamic grass layer - Natural terraforming - Seasonal weather system - Improved plant/farming system - Food variety need - Fishing - Silk production and looms - And much more smaller stuff ...
To get a more detailed overview of the main features visit the wiki feature overview: https://github.com/Lanilor/Terra-Project/wiki/Feature-overview There is also a small FAQ which will grow over time: https://github.com/Lanilor/Terra-Project/wiki/FAQ
